content: X-M6-8 B3 DP7 SCT Threaded studs Threaded studs for use with the BX 3-SCT Spray concrete testing tool ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster, cleaner shotcrete testing method – benefit from the lower noise, recoil and maintenance of a fully electric testing tool, while avoiding the storage, import and disposal hassles of powder-actuated versions Versatile solution – multiple shank lengths available, so you can use the same testing method on a wider compressive strength range Applications Quick measurement of the early strength of sprayed concrete (shotcrete) using the battery actuated BX 3-SCT ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coating 5-13 µm Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coating 5-13 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Thread diameter | 0.24 in | Point type | Ballistic | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2323247 - Threaded stud X-M6-8-52 DP7 SCT B3 - Package Size 100 pc - 2323246 - Threaded stud X-M6-8-62 DP7 SCT B3 - Package Size 100 pc - 2323248 - Threaded stud X-M6-8-87 DP7 SCT B3 - Package Size 100 pc
